events.name: Sprint planning with story points
events.description:
Sprint Goal: Complete user authentication revamp

Stories:
- AUTH-123: Implement OAuth2 flow (8 pts)
- AUTH-124: Add MFA support (5 pts)
- AUTH-125: Session management (3 pts)
- AUTH-126: Rate limiting (2 pts)

Velocity: 28 points / sprint

- 48 hours to build

- Judged on innovation, execution, and impact
